org.apache.hadoop.crypto

Class OpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoCodec
      • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.AesCtrCryptoCodec
        • org.apache.hadoop.crypto.OpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class OpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec
extends AesCtrCryptoCodec
    Implement the AES-CTR crypto codec using JNI into OpenSSL.
